original_text: And Moab was in great dread of the people, because they were many. Moab was overcome with fear of the people of Israel.
korean_text: 모압이 심히 두려워하였으니 이스라엘 백성이 많음으로 말미암아 모압이 이스라엘 자손 때문에 번민하더라

sentences.original_text: And Moab was in great dread of the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모압은 그 백성을 심히 두려워했으니

sentences.original_text: Moab was overcome with fear of the people of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 모압은 이스라엘 백성 때문에 극도의 두려움에 사로잡혔다
